title: Book Cover, "Book Cover:  André Gide by Van Meter Ames", 1940s
medium: Offset lithograph on cream coated paper
signed: Imprinted in white, lower left corner:  lustig
inscribed: Imprinted in white to the right of center (sideways):  THE MAKERS OF MODERN LITERATURE; in black, center left:  andré/GIDE/by Van Meter Ames; along spine (sideways):  ANDRÉ GIDE by Van Meter Ames; in white, lower left corner: lustig
description: A pie-shaped turquoise form fills the upper right corner; an irregular turquoise rectangle, whose top edge slopes upward, covers the lower half and lower spine.  Joining the two turqoise forms, an over-printed large double arrow in black with two black circles (like tuning knobs on a musical instrument) on either side of the vertical stem.  Imprinted in white over the arrow (sideways):  THE MAKERS OF MODERN LITERATURE.   In the negative white area (between the turqoise forms), left, the book's title and author in black.  Along the spine (sideways), the book's title and author.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "Book Cover:  André Gide by Van Meter Ames", 1940s.
1940s. Offset lithograph on cream coated paper. Gift of Susan Lustig Peck. 2001-29-29.
